name: Crash (Nemesis Games)
description:
CRASH

crash

/kraʃ/

collide violently with an obstacle or another vehicle.

Nearly 1.3 million people die in road crashes each year. That is an average of 3,287 deaths per day. Where is all this happening?

Well, most fatal accidents occur within 25 miles from the person's home. It is usually because the brain becomes less cautious while performing familiar and repetitive tasks like driving in one's neighborhood.

Play CRASH to stay cautious.

Credits

Models : LowPoly Cars by quaternius,

LowPoly Modular Street by quaternius.

Music : Electronic Rock Bundle by Dimitri Kovalchuk.

Sound Effects : FREE Casual Game SFX Pack by Dustyroom,

Grenade Sound FX by MGWSoundDesign.

Visual Effects : Polygonal's Low-Poly Particle Pack by Polygonal Stuff.

Font : Rajdhani by Indian Type Foundry.
